name: Mister Gun - Home Assault Age
description:
This is the best shoot, destroy, smash casino, mansion, house interior destruction game with the best physics and reality.
Destroy the casino, mansion, house interiors with different guns.Smash the casino, mansion, house interiors with bullets and rocket launcher / bazooka

There are two maps in this game and each mode has free map level where you can use rocket launcher / bazooka to smash and destroy everything around you for free!

Destroy the casino, old house and destroy the modern house in this game.
this game contain excellent interiors. Reduce your stress and play this game
Destruct the casino, home and mansion interiors with guns and enjoy the destruction effects.
Be an angry wife and smash the house.Shoot the modern interiors

Features:
1. Awesome casino map, with 5 different levels, you can destroy, smash, blast all kinds of casino slots, roulette tables, black jack tables, craps tables

2. Fantastic mansion house- home map, with 5 different levels you can destroy, smash, blast all kinds of furniture in the house, electronic goods, house interiors, home chairs, home tables, and much more! new map such as office, supermarket will be added in the future updates

3. Wide variety of different guns to choose from, you can also use rocket launcher in free modes as well for free, the guns come with unlimited ammo and will be updated with more guns and other weapons regularly every update

4. The game comes with 2 different modes, Mission and free mode, the user can play around freely and is a good stress reliever

5. Unlimited and non stop shooting, that's right! you can shoot as much as you want without needing additional bullets for shooting, destroying or smashing with your guns!

6. More maps such as office, supermarket will be added in the future updates, guns and other destruction weapons will be added on every update.

Enjoy the best every destruction,smash,shooting and stress reliever game, get your stress relief now! download the best stress relief blast and destruction game now!
